Text.text: Quality Agent - A person who holds a full-time or part-time contract with Prudential Assurance Malaysia Berhad and registered as a PRULIA Member. Such Quality Agents are allowed to vote at any meeting of the association or hold any office.

Quality Leader - A person who holds a full-time Agent contract with Prudential Assurance Malaysia Berhad and is in a position of UM1, UM2, AM or SAM. Such Quality Leaders are allowed to vote at any meeting of the association or hold any office.

Every application for membership shall be forwarded to the Secretary who shall at the first convenient opportunity submit it to the Committee for approval. Committee may at its discretion reject any application without assigning any reason therefore.

Every applicant whose application has been approved as aforesaid shall upon payment of the entrance fee and the yearly subscription be admitted as a member of the Association and shall be entitled to all privileges of the appropriate membership and shall be bound by the provisions of the of the Rules of the of the Committee then enforce or which may thereafter be implemented from time to time.

The annual membership fee shall be payable by applicants for admission as follows:
Quality Leader: RM 100.00 Quality Agent: RM 50.00
